name: Side HELL
description:
Created for GeoJam2022, It's my first ever GameJam and I am quite satisfied with the results!

You play as a little white cube that has to avoid colorfull blocks dropping down.

You must avoid them by moving around, jumping and switching gravity!

Each side has its own gimmick :

South side - blocks fall with a mid speed in diffrent sizes

West side - the blocks are chunky but spawn more rarely and are sllow

North side - small fast blocks that bounce from side to side

East side - "sniper blocks" there is a few of them but they are bloody fast!

Please comment about the game! :)
